name: Kartavya Sharma
bio: I am a freshman at UC Berkeley studying Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS) as an undergraduate. I am enthusiastic about new dev technologies and competitive programming.
fromAuthor: Hi, welcome to my blog! You'll find all sorts of posts here ranging from Gatsby/React tutorials to my thoughts on the current developments in Computer Science. If you like what you read, or if you have any suggestions, feel free to leave a comment.
